text:
Chime | San Francisco | Multiple positions | Full time | Competitive salary + benefits + equity | https://www.chimebank.com/job-openings/

We are an internet-only bank that charges no fees (ex out-of-network ATM fees). We just raised a large round of funding and are expanding in all roles. Our latest milestone is signing up our 1,000,000th customer. We have cool digs in downtown SF handy for BART, Muni, and Caltrain.

We have openings in:

Senior Back-end Engineer - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Senior Full-Stack Engineer - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Senior QA Engineer - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Marketing Designer - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Senior User Researcher - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Technical Sourcer - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Product Manager, Core Accounts - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Program Manager - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Senior Fraud Specialist - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/chimecom/view/P_AAAA...

Resume and Cover Letter to guy@chime.com
